page.title: 08ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Eastbury House is the site of the annual Tarrant Gunville Horse Show, an informal and enjoyable event attracting entries from around the county. There are various fetes and garden parties held in gardens for different charities and the church fete has been held in recent years in the grounds of Eastbury house. Whilst drives and Bingo sessions are held in the village halls. There is nothing in the way of entertainment provided for chidren or young people who have to look further afield for Scouts, Young Farmers, Youth Clubs etc various sports are enjoyed in Blandford Sports Centre or one of the nearby public schools.
